# MTLAttributeDescriptorArray

**Class**

An array of attribute descriptor objects.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLAttributeDescriptorArray
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAttributeDescriptorArray] defines the data format and index binding for the attribute argument table, using [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAttributeDescriptor] instances.

## Accessing attribute state objects

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the state of the specified attribute.

## Configuring compute pass inputs

- **stageInputDescriptor**: The organization of input and output data for the next kernel call.
- **MTLAttributeDescriptor**: A descriptor of an argument’s format and where its data is in memory.
- **MTLBufferLayoutDescriptor**: A description of how a compute function fetches input data for an attribute.
- **MTLBufferLayoutDescriptorArray**: An array of buffer layout descriptor objects.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CVarArg
